issue.title: bump tokio to 1.x
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11295](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11295). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
bump tokio to 1.x since all downstream libraries have moved to 1.x in recent releases.
